'Liberty in North Korea' (LiNK) "is the only full-time grassroots organization
in North America devoted to the North Korean human rights and humanitarian
crises. LiNK provides protection and aid to North Korean refugees hiding in
China and, utilizing a modern-day underground railroad through Southeast Asia,
rescues refugees and helps them to reach freedom. LiNKâs global grassroots
movement works to redefine public perception on North Korea, shifting attention
away from the politics and onto the people, and provides a way for concerned
citizens to come alongside the North Korean people and help bring about positive
change. LiNK also works to develop people-focused strategies that will have the
potential to promote change inside North Korea in the long term." http://libertyinnorthkorea.org/about/ LiNK is headquartered
in Torrance, California, United States with affiliates worldwide. http://libertyinnorthkorea.org/contact/
